properties.areaDesc: Bossier, LA; Claiborne, LA; Webster, LA; Bienville, LA
properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 10 at 1:44PM CST until February 10 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Shreveport LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Southern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Southwestern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Northern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Southeastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana...

* Until 445 PM CST.

* At 143 PM CST, Doppler radar and automated gauges indicated
thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to
two inches of rain have already fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing
or expected to begin shortly.

HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.

SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges.

IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas,
highways, streets and underpasses as well as other
drainage and low lying areas.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Minden, Arcadia, Ringgold, Sibley, Gibsland, Doyline, Dubberly,
Dixie Inn, Heflin, Athens, Jamestown, Bryceland, Mount Lebanon,
Plum Orchard Landing, Gilark, Sailes, Noles Landing, Lake Bistineau
North, Lake Clairborne and Ogden.

Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in
the warned area.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

CMAMtext: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 4:45 PM CST. Avoid flooded areas.
